channel.title: Help with equipping custom
channel.description:
Hello, i just started doing the Custom part of my server, i have made 2 items for testing... D Claws and Death Cape. I want to know two things. They aren't going into the right spot. I need help with that.
1. Is it the Item4.java that edit's where like the cape goes in to cape and claws goes into weapon? (i already know you don't need to touch the claws)
2. How do i fix it.
Tip: I did do the Item4.java thing (put in 9119 [Death Cape Code for my server] under the 'Capes' part. But it won't work. I'm using Galkons client, and using AllStar V2 source. Please help.

item.title: Help with equipping custom
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

um… i am right now going through a tutorial of making custom items, they are under the client help part i think or somewhere under there it;s a stink called “All about Modeling” and item4.java came with my source.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with equipping custom
item.dc:creator: @camster912 camster912
item.description:
@camster912 wrote:

did u try using yahoo answers or youtube and wiki answer they are very helpful but alos can u help me with making custom items and do u create item4.java how do u do all of that?!?!?!?

item.title: Help with equipping custom
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

Hello, i just started doing the Custom part of my server, i have made 2 items for testing… D Claws and Death Cape. I want to know two things. They aren’t going into the right spot. I need help with that.

  1. Is it the Item4.java that edit’s where like the cape goes in to cape and claws goes into weapon? (i already know you don’t need to touch the claws)
